title: Forever Mine
description: ♥ Aiden Maxwell is going home! ♥Going home causes so many mixed emotions for me. I don't know which one to focus on.The only two things I wanted to leave my hometown for were, college and to be a pitcher in the MLB. I had a sports scholarship already secured and the MLB career seemed a sure thing. I was good, and I knew it. College and the pro career were only to pass my time. I had a forever goal in mind and she was in Hayden Falls.A split-second decision when I was eighteen changed my life. I lost everything, her included. I wasn't sorry for why I made that life-altering decision. If given the chance, I'd do it again. I was sorry for what it had cost me. Mainly because of her. She was engaged now. I had waited too long to go home.Today, because of a tour bus accident, I was going home. Home to a town that had written me off years ago. Home to watch the woman I loved marry someone else.I wasn't going to survive this.♥ Forever Mine is the first book in the Hayden Falls series ♥
author: Debbie Hyde
